EmailTemplate.description: NPC Mail to Notification Group Members
EmailTemplate.name: NPC Mail to Notification Group Member
EmailTemplate.subject: NPC After Proto Form Confirmation: ref #{!New_Part_Creation_Form__c.Name} {!New_Part_Creation_Form__c.Fab__c} ({!New_Part_Creation_Form__c.New_Part_ID__c}) (Originator)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
GLOBALFOUNDRIES has received your request to activate the EOL part id {!New_Part_Creation_Form__c.New_Part_ID__c}. This part already removed from our product list and we are evaluating the possibility to reactivate. Please do not return the reticles or place PO's until we complete the evaluation and determine if we can support this request. In some cases, it may not be possible to support your request. We will make reasonable efforts to revert to you within 14 working days. Please contact the customer support team if you have any questions regarding the reactivation process.
